sprunked-2-0.title: Sprunked 2.0 (Sprunked 2.0)
sprunked-2-0.slogan: 沉浸在Sprunked 2.0（Incredibox 模组）的黑暗音效中！ (Immerse Yourselves in the Dark Sounds of Sprunked 2.0 (Incredibox Mod)!)
sprunked-2-0.description: 体验 Sprunked 2.0 的增强版领域，改版后的角色和强化恐怖视觉效果融合，创造沉浸式游戏体验。 (Experience the enhanced realm of Sprunked 2.0 where revamped characters and intensified horror visuals merge to create an immersive gameplay adventure.)

HomeIframe.title: Sprunked 2.0：步入黑暗 (Sprunked 2.0: Enter the Dark)
HomeIframe.description: 沉浸在 Sprunked 2.0 神秘的世界中，阴暗的环境和令人毛骨悚然的音效，处处充满谜团。(Dive into the enigmatic world of Sprunked 2.0 with its shadowy settings and haunting sounds where mystery awaits at every turn.)

HomeFeatures.whatIsDescription: Sprunked 2.0 (Incredibox 模组) 引入了更黑暗的领域，融入了重新设计的角色和令人毛骨悚然的视觉效果，增强了悬念，营造了阴森的环境。 (Sprunked 2.0 Mod of Incredibox introduces a darker realm with redesigned characters and haunting visuals. This mod heightens suspense with eerie landscapes.)
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep1: 选择增强角色：从众多经过改进的角色中选择，增加悬念和音乐层次。
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep2: 混合匹配音效：拖放音效，构建充满令人毛骨悚然节拍的恐怖配乐。
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep3: 解锁恐怖奖励：独特地组合角色，以揭示特殊效果和动画。
HomeFeatures.feature1Description: 每个角色都经过恐怖主题的重新设计，以提升游戏的恐怖气氛。
HomeFeatures.feature2Description: 黑暗、阴暗的艺术风格创造了沉浸式、令人紧张的环境。
HomeFeatures.feature3Description: 更丰富的音景提供了创作深度、令人毛骨悚然混合的选项。
HomeFeatures.feature4Description: 发现隐藏的组合，激活独特的动画和音效，非常适合恐怖主题。
